title: Yoooo LLMs thooo
text:
Welcome to My Website!
This is a brief introduction to my website. You can find more information about me and my work in the following sections:

About - Learn more about me and my background.
Blog - Read my latest blog posts on various topics.

[Imagen of A landscape painting with rolling hills, a clear blue sky, and a winding river] # Optional image for the hero section
Stay tuned for more!
This website is still under development, but I’ll be adding more content soon.

title: nbdev1
text:
# check if we can import the llama.cpp python bindings 
from llama_cpp import Llama



# point the Llama class to the model weights we downloaded in the previous sections
work_dir = "/Users/adamaslan/code/llm-class/llama.cpp/"
llm = Llama(f"{work_dir}/models/gemma-7b-it/gemma-7b-it-Q5_K_M.gguf");

Using fallback chat format: None



# asking Gemma for help building a website
prefix = "<start_of_turn>user" 
suffix = "<end_of_turn>\n<start_of_turn>model\n"
prompt = "Please provide 10 simple steps for building a website."

full_prompt = f'''<start_of_turn>user
{prompt}
<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model"
'''


# calling the llm from the notebook
output = llm(
    full_prompt, 
    max_tokens=1000,
    temperature=0.0,
    repeat_penalty=1.0,
    echo=True,
);

Llama.generate: prefix-match hit



# viewing the in-notebook gemma-7b-it generation
print(output['choices'][0]['text'])
